00257 template <class GuiCompBase>
00258 bool TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::CreateContainerGui(QWidget& parentWidget)
00259 {
00260        // initialize the GUI container
00261        QLayout* layoutPtr = parentWidget.layout();
00262        if (layoutPtr == NULL){
00263               if (*m_useHorizontalLayoutAttrPtr){
00264                      layoutPtr = new QHBoxLayout(&parentWidget);
00265               }
00266               else{
00267                      layoutPtr = new QVBoxLayout(&parentWidget);
00268               }
00269        }
00270        layoutPtr->setMargin(0);
00271 
00272        QToolBox* toolBoxPtr;
00273        QTabWidget* tabWidgetPtr;
00274        QSplitter* splitterPtr;
00275        int guiMode = *m_designTypeAttrPtr;
00276 
00277        switch (guiMode){
00278               case DT_TAB_WIDGET:
00279                      parentWidget.setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00280                      m_guiContainerPtr = tabWidgetPtr = new QTabWidget(&parentWidget);
00281                      layoutPtr->addWidget(tabWidgetPtr);
00282                      break;
00283 
00284               case DT_TOOL_BOX:
00285                      parentWidget.setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00286                      m_guiContainerPtr = toolBoxPtr = new QToolBox(&parentWidget);
00287                      toolBoxPtr->setBackgroundRole(QPalette::Window);
00288                      layoutPtr->addWidget(toolBoxPtr);
00289                      break;
00290                      
00291               case DT_SPLITTER:
00292                      m_guiContainerPtr = splitterPtr = new QSplitter(&parentWidget);
00293                      if (*m_useHorizontalLayoutAttrPtr){
00294                             splitterPtr->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
00295                      }
00296                      else{
00297                             splitterPtr->setOrientation(Qt::Vertical);
00298                      }
00299                      layoutPtr->addWidget(splitterPtr);
00300                      break;
00301 
00302               default:
00303                      m_guiContainerPtr = &parentWidget;
00304        }
00305 
00306        if (m_iconSizeAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00307               QSize iconSize = QSize(m_iconSizeAttrPtr->GetValue(), m_iconSizeAttrPtr->GetValue());
00308               if (!iconSize.isNull() && iconSize.isValid() && !iconSize.isEmpty()){
00309                      SetPageIconSize(*m_guiContainerPtr, iconSize);
00310               }
00311        }
00312 
00313        if (*m_insertSpacerAttrPtr){
00314               QSpacerItem* spacerPtr = NULL;
00315               if (*m_useHorizontalLayoutAttrPtr){
00316                      spacerPtr = new QSpacerItem(0, 0, QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00317               }
00318               else{
00319                      spacerPtr = new QSpacerItem(0, 0, QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Minimum);
00320               }
00321 
00322               layoutPtr->addItem(spacerPtr);
00323        }
00324 
00325        return (m_guiContainerPtr != NULL);
00326 }

00385 template <class GuiCompBase>
00386 int TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::AddPageToContainerWidget(
00387                      QWidget& containerWidget,
00388                      iqtgui::IGuiObject& pageGui,
00389                      const QString& pageTitle) const
00390 {
00391        int guiMode = *m_designTypeAttrPtr;
00392        bool addSpacer = false;
00393        int pageIndex = -1;
00394 
00395        QWidget* panelPtr = NULL;
00396 
00397        if (guiMode == DT_TAB_WIDGET){
00398               panelPtr = new QWidget(&containerWidget);
00399               new QVBoxLayout(panelPtr);
00400               QTabWidget* tabWidgetPtr = static_cast<QTabWidget*>(&containerWidget);
00401               pageIndex = tabWidgetPtr->addTab(panelPtr, pageTitle);
00402 
00403               addSpacer = true;
00404        }
00405        else if (guiMode == DT_TOOL_BOX){
00406               panelPtr = new QWidget(&containerWidget);
00407               QLayout* panelLayoutPtr = new QVBoxLayout(panelPtr);
00408               panelLayoutPtr->setContentsMargins(6, 0, 6, 0);
00409               QToolBox* toolBoxPtr = static_cast<QToolBox*>(&containerWidget);
00410               pageIndex = toolBoxPtr->addItem(panelPtr, pageTitle);
00411 
00412               addSpacer = true;
00413        }
00414        else if (guiMode == DT_SPLITTER){
00415               QSplitter* splitterPtr = static_cast<QSplitter*>(&containerWidget);
00416               panelPtr = new QWidget(&containerWidget);
00417               QLayout* panelLayoutPtr = new QVBoxLayout(panelPtr);
00418               panelLayoutPtr->setMargin(0);
00419               splitterPtr->addWidget(panelPtr);
00420        }
00421        else{
00422               if (!pageTitle.isEmpty()){
00423                      panelPtr = new QGroupBox(pageTitle, &containerWidget);
00424                      new QVBoxLayout(panelPtr);
00425               }
00426               else{
00427                      panelPtr = new QWidget(&containerWidget);
00428                      QLayout* panelLayoutPtr = new QVBoxLayout(panelPtr);
00429                      panelLayoutPtr->setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0);
00430               }
00431               QLayout* parentLayoutPtr = containerWidget.layout();
00432               if (parentLayoutPtr != NULL){
00433                      parentLayoutPtr->addWidget(panelPtr);
00434               }
00435        }
00436 
00437        if (pageGui.GetWidget() != NULL){
00438               QLayout* panelLayoutPtr = panelPtr->layout();
00439               if (panelLayoutPtr != NULL){
00440                      panelLayoutPtr->addWidget(pageGui.GetWidget());
00441               }
00442               else{
00443                      pageGui.GetWidget()->setParent(panelPtr);
00444               }
00445        }
00446        else{
00447               pageGui.CreateGui(panelPtr);
00448        }
00449 
00450        if (addSpacer){
00451               QLayout* panelLayoutPtr = panelPtr->layout();
00452               if (panelLayoutPtr != NULL){
00453                      QSpacerItem* spacerPtr = new QSpacerItem(0, 0, QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::MinimumExpanding);
00454                      panelLayoutPtr->addItem(spacerPtr);
00455               }
00456        }
00457 
00458        return pageIndex;
00459 }

00462 template <class GuiCompBase>
00463 bool TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::SetPageEnabled(QWidget& containerWidget, int pageIndex, bool isPageEnabled) const
00464 {
00465        QTabWidget* tabWidgetPtr = dynamic_cast<QTabWidget*>(&containerWidget);
00466        if (tabWidgetPtr != NULL){
00467               tabWidgetPtr->setTabEnabled(pageIndex, isPageEnabled);
00468 
00469               return true;
00470        }
00471 
00472        QToolBox* toolBoxPtr = dynamic_cast<QToolBox*>(&containerWidget);
00473        if (toolBoxPtr != NULL){
00474               toolBoxPtr->setItemEnabled(pageIndex, isPageEnabled);
00475 
00476               return true;
00477        }
00478 
00479        QSplitter* splitterPtr = dynamic_cast<QSplitter*>(&containerWidget);
00480        if (splitterPtr != NULL){
00481               QWidget* pageWidgetPtr = splitterPtr->widget(pageIndex);
00482               Q_ASSERT(pageWidgetPtr != NULL);
00483 
00484               pageWidgetPtr->setEnabled(isPageEnabled);
00485 
00486               return true;
00487        }
00488 
00489        return false;
00490 }

00500 template <class GuiCompBase>
00501 QString TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::GetPageGuiName(const iqtgui::IGuiObject& pageGui) const
00502 {
00503        if (m_guiNamesMap.contains(&pageGui)){
00504               return m_guiNamesMap[&pageGui];
00505        }
00506 
00507        return QString();

00511 template <class GuiCompBase>
00512 bool TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::CreatePage(QWidget* containerWidgetPtr, int guiIndex)
00513 {
00514        iqtgui::IGuiObject* guiPtr = GetPageGuiComponent(guiIndex);
00515        if (guiPtr != NULL){
00516               QString pageTitle = GetPageGuiName(*guiPtr);
00517 
00518               int pageIndex = AddPageToContainerWidget(*containerWidgetPtr, *guiPtr, pageTitle);
00519               if (pageIndex < 0){
00520                      pageIndex = guiIndex;
00521               }
00522 
00523               m_pageToGuiIndexMap[pageIndex] = guiIndex;
00524 
00525               if (          (guiIndex < m_slaveWidgetsVisualCompPtr.GetCount()) &&
00526                                    (guiIndex < m_slaveWidgetsModelCompPtr.GetCount())){
00527                      imod::IModel* modelPtr = m_slaveWidgetsModelCompPtr[guiIndex];
00528                      if ((m_slaveWidgetsVisualCompPtr[guiIndex] != NULL) && (modelPtr != NULL)){
00529                             RegisterModel(modelPtr, guiIndex);
00530                      }
00531               }
00532 
00533               return true;
00534        }
00535 
00536        return false;
00537 }

00540 template <class GuiCompBase>
00541 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::UpdateVisualElements()
00542 {
00543        QWidget* widgetPtr = GetQtWidget();
00544        Q_ASSERT(widgetPtr != NULL);
00545 
00546        int visualProvidersCount = m_slaveWidgetsVisualCompPtr.GetCount();
00547 
00548        for (         PageToGuiIndexMap::ConstIterator iter = m_pageToGuiIndexMap.constBegin();
00549                             iter != m_pageToGuiIndexMap.constEnd();
00550                             ++iter){
00551               int pageIndex = iter.key();
00552               Q_ASSERT(pageIndex >= 0);
00553               Q_ASSERT(pageIndex < GetPagesCount());
00554 
00555               int guiIndex = iter.value();
00556               Q_ASSERT(guiIndex >= 0);
00557               Q_ASSERT(guiIndex < GetPagesCount());
00558 
00559               QIcon pageIcon;
00560               QString pageToolTip;
00561 
00562               if (guiIndex < visualProvidersCount){
00563                      const IVisualStatusProvider* visualProviderPtr = m_slaveWidgetsVisualCompPtr[guiIndex];
00564                      if (visualProviderPtr != NULL){
00565                             pageIcon = visualProviderPtr->GetStatusIcon();
00566                             pageToolTip = visualProviderPtr->GetStatusText();
00567                      }
00568               }
00569 
00570               SetPageIcon(*widgetPtr, pageIndex, pageIcon);
00571               SetPageToolTip(*widgetPtr, pageIndex, pageToolTip);
00572        }
00573 
00574        m_pageModel.UpdatePageState();
00575 }

00578 // reimplemented (iqtgui::CGuiComponentBase)
00579 
00580 template <class GuiCompBase>
00581 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::OnGuiCreated()
00582 {
00583        BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
00584 
00585        QWidget* guiContainerPtr = GetGuiContainerPtr();
00586 
00587        int pagesCount = GetPagesCount();
00588        for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < pagesCount; pageIndex++){
00589               CreatePage(guiContainerPtr, pageIndex);
00590        }
00591 }
00592 
00593 
00594 template <class GuiCompBase>
00595 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::OnGuiDestroyed()
00596 {
00597        m_pageToGuiIndexMap.clear();
00598 
00599        int pagesCount = GetPagesCount();
00600        for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < pagesCount; pageIndex++){
00601               iqtgui::IGuiObject* guiPtr = GetPageGuiComponent(pageIndex);
00602               if (guiPtr != NULL){
00603                      guiPtr->DestroyGui();
00604               }
00605        }
00606 
00607        BaseClass::OnGuiDestroyed();
00608 }
00609 
00610 
00611 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00612 
00613 template <class GuiCompBase>
00614 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::OnComponentCreated()
00615 {
00616        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00617 
00618        // Map page GUIs with their names:
00619        int pagesCount = GetPagesCount();
00620        for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < pagesCount; ++pageIndex){
00621               iqtgui::IGuiObject* guiPtr = GetPageGuiComponent(pageIndex);
00622               if (guiPtr == NULL){
00623                      continue;
00624               }
00625 
00626               QString name;
00627               if (pageIndex < m_pageNamesAttrPtr.GetCount()){
00628                      name = m_pageNamesAttrPtr[pageIndex];
00629               }
00630               else{
00631                      continue;
00632               }
00633 
00634               m_guiNamesMap[guiPtr] = name;
00635        }
00636 
00637        m_pageModel.SetParent(this);
00638 }
00639 
00640 
00641 template <class GuiCompBase>
00642 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00643 {
00644        m_guiNamesMap.clear();
00645 
00646        m_pageModel.SetParent(NULL);
00647 
00648        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00649 }

00675 template <class GuiCompBase>
00676 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::SetParent(TContainerGuiCompBase* parentPtr)
00677 {
00678        if (parentPtr != m_parentPtr){
00679               if (m_parentPtr != NULL){
00680                      EnsureModelsDetached();
00681               }
00682 
00683               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00684                      int activatorsCount = qMin(parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr.GetCount(), parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsModelCompPtr.GetCount());
00685                      for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < activatorsCount; ++pageIndex){
00686                             imod::IModel* modelPtr = parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsModelCompPtr[pageIndex];
00687 
00688                             if (!modelPtr->IsAttached(this)){
00689                                    modelPtr->AttachObserver(this);
00690                             }
00691                      }
00692               }
00693 
00694               m_parentPtr = parentPtr;
00695        }
00696 }
00697 
00698 
00699 template <class GuiCompBase>
00700 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::UpdatePageState()
00701 {
00702        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00703 
00704        QWidget* containerWidgetPtr = m_parentPtr->GetGuiContainerPtr();
00705        Q_ASSERT(containerWidgetPtr != NULL);
00706 
00707        int activatorsCount = qMin(m_parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsCompPtr.GetCount(), m_parentPtr->GetPagesCount());
00708        for (int i = 0; i < activatorsCount; ++i){
00709               const iprm::IEnableableParam* paramPtr = m_parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsCompPtr[i];
00710               if (paramPtr != NULL){
00711                      m_parentPtr->SetPageEnabled(*containerWidgetPtr, i, paramPtr->IsEnabled());
00712               }
00713        }
00714 }
00715 
00716 
00717 // reimplemented (iprm::ISelectionParam)
00718 
00719 template <class GuiCompBase>
00720 bool TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::SetSelectedOptionIndex(int index)
00721 {
00722        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00723 
00724        if (BaseClass::SetSelectedOptionIndex(index)){
00725               QWidget* containerWidgetPtr = m_parentPtr->GetGuiContainerPtr();
00726               if (containerWidgetPtr != NULL){
00727                      m_parentPtr->SetCurrentPage(*containerWidgetPtr, index);
00728               }
00729        }
00730 
00731        return false;
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00735 // reimplemented (iprm::IOptionsList)
00736 
00737 template <class GuiCompBase>
00738 int TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::GetOptionsFlags() const
00739 {
00740        return SCF_SUPPORT_DISABLED | SCF_SUPPORT_UNIQUE_ID;
00741 }
00742 
00743 
00744 template <class GuiCompBase>
00745 int TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::GetOptionsCount() const
00746 {
00747        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00748 
00749        return m_parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr.GetCount();
00750 }
00751 
00752 
00753 template <class GuiCompBase>
00754 QString TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::GetOptionName(int index) const
00755 {
00756        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00757        Q_ASSERT(index < m_parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr.GetCount());
00758 
00759        return m_parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr[index];
00760 }
00761 
00762 
00763 template <class GuiCompBase>
00764 QString TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::GetOptionDescription(int index) const
00765 {
00766        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00767        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00768 
00769        QWidget* containerWidgetPtr = m_parentPtr->GetGuiContainerPtr();
00770        if (containerWidgetPtr != NULL){
00771               return m_parentPtr->GetPageTitle(*containerWidgetPtr, index);
00772        }
00773 
00774        return QString();
00775 }
00776 
00777 
00778 template <class GuiCompBase>
00779 QByteArray TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::GetOptionId(int index) const
00780 {
00781        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00782        Q_ASSERT(index < m_parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr.GetCount());
00783 
00784        return m_parentPtr->m_pageNamesAttrPtr[index].toUtf8();
00785 }
00786 
00787 
00788 template <class GuiCompBase>
00789 bool TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::IsOptionEnabled(int index) const
00790 {
00791        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00792        Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00793 
00794        if (index >= m_parentPtr->GetPagesCount()){
00795               return false;
00796        }
00797 
00798        if (index < m_parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsCompPtr.GetCount()){
00799               const iprm::IEnableableParam* paramPtr = m_parentPtr->m_pageActivatorsCompPtr[index];
00800               if (paramPtr != NULL){
00801                      return paramPtr->IsEnabled();
00802               }
00803        }
00804 
00805        return true;
00806 }
00807 
00808 
00809 // protected methods of the embedded class PageModel
00810 
00811 // reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00812 
00813 template <class GuiCompBase>
00814 void TContainerGuiCompBase<GuiCompBase>::PageModel::OnEndChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr)
00815 {
00816        Q_ASSERT(m_parentPtr != NULL);
00817 
00818        BaseClass::OnEndChanges(changeFlags, changeParamsPtr);
00819 
00820        if (m_parentPtr->IsGuiCreated()){
00821               UpdatePageState();
00822        }
00823 }
